m:MaterialTitle.title: Markup Definition
m:MaterialTitle.description: FIRST , Set your source and target components.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<!-- Source Component -->
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnSource" text="Meaningful Transitions" backgroundColor="blue" size="LARGE" />
<!-- Target Component -->
<ma:overlay.MaterialOverlay ui:field="overlayTarget" visibility="HIDDEN" opacity="0" textAlign="CENTER" backgroundColor="blue" >
<m:MaterialTitle addStyleNames="{style.title}" textColor="white" title="Meaningful transitions" description="Motion design can effectively guide the user’s attention in ways that both inform and delight. Use motion to smoothly transport users between navigational contexts, explain changes in the arrangement of elements on a screen, and reinforce element hierarchy."/>
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnClose" text="Back to Main Page" backgroundColor="blue lighten-2" textColor="white" size="LARGE" />
</ma:overlay.MaterialOverlay>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Source Logic
m:MaterialTitle.description: SECOND , Add an event into your source component and inside that method you need to call MaterialPathAnimator.animate() method.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Target Logic
m:MaterialTitle.description: THIRD , In order to go to the original position of Source component from Target component. You need to set the resting styles of target component and call MaterialPathAnimator.animate() method to apply the deslightful animation.

m:MaterialTitle.title: 1. Button to Overlay Panel
m:MaterialTitle.description: Source Component : MaterialButton and Target Component : MaterialOverlay

m:MaterialTitle.title: 2. Card to Overlay Panel
m:MaterialTitle.description: Source Component : Card and Target Component : Material Panel

m:MaterialLabel.text: I am a very simple card. I am good at containing small bits of information. I am convenient because I require little markup to use effectively.

m:MaterialTitle.title: 3. Button to Card
m:MaterialTitle.description: Source Component : MaterialButton and Target Component : MaterialCard

m:MaterialLabel.text: I am a very simple card. I am good at containing small bits of information. I am convenient because I require little markup to use effectively.

m:MaterialTitle.title: 4. Grid to Overlay Panel

m:MaterialTitle.description: Source Component : MaterialIcon and Target Component : MaterialOverlay.
